value:
$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_22_Tor_FF_Pair,Face|Oh my, Thórr, look... There's a rare
sight, wouldn't you say?$k$p$nMPID_比翼トール|Nifl, the god of ice? Was she
intentionally summoned here,
to the tropics of all places?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|Identify yourselves. Most mortals
do not have the ability to tell I—$k$pAh. I see. You are like me...
Both of you.$k$pWhatever it is you are involved
in here, I want no part of it.
Leave me alone.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_22_Tor_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, come now. No need for all that.
We have no interest in quarreling
with you, dear.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Swim22,Face|Then leave me alone.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ味方,ch00_22_Tor_FF_Pair,Face|Of course! Apologies for the bother.
Though, I'm sure we'll be seeing
more of each other sooner or later...$k$p$Sbs150|
